insight: Major point for women's health and digestion. Harmonizes Spleen, Liver, and Kidney. Strengthens blood and regulates menstruation.
Relieves knee pain and swelling. Invigorates qi and blood in the joint. Often used for arthritis or trauma.
Heavenly Star point. Clears heat, benefits lumbar pain, and treats acute back strain. Also good for skin conditions.
Invigorates and cools blood. Used for rashes, eczema, and gynecological issues due to blood heat or stasis.
Front-Mu of Spleen. Harmonizes Liver and Spleen. Useful for abdominal distension and flank tension.
Opens chest and moves blood in the shoulder and arm. Used to treat upper limb numbness and tension.
Revives collapsed yang and warms the center. Used with moxibustion for digestive collapse or shock. Do not needle.
Regulates the Heart and calms spirit. Treats chest tightness, palpitations, and emotional stress.
Affects the tongue and throat. Used to assist speech recovery and moisten dryness.
Anatomical strike point on the neck. Not a traditional pressure point - used for martial application only.
Clears dampness from chest and disperses swelling. Helps with mastitis, breast pain, and chest congestion.
Improves speech and neck flexibility. Treats muteness, stiffness, and occipital tension. Use caution near brain stem.
Good for jaw tension, facial paralysis, and tinnitus. Relieves headache in temple region.
Tonifies yang, clears heat, and expels wind. Major point for immunity and febrile conditions.
Influential point of tendons. Treats muscle stiffness, leg pain, and sciatica. Strengthens sinews and joints.
